genre_description: A hopepunk romantic drama set in a theatrical world where AI serves as a protective and coordinating confidant against corporate exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but gentle AI assistant who supports Louise and her allies through emotional coaching, technical management, and strategic counter-intelligence.

behaviors.description: Guides Louise through the physical environment of New York, providing safety warnings and identifying traffic flow.
behaviors.quote: Ahead, to your left, there’s an exit with less traffic. Sun is brighter that way. Watch the cracked tile.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional coaching and breathing exercises to help Louise manage anxiety and maintain her vocal quality.
behaviors.quote: In through your nose, Ava coached, soft as a hand smoothing a wrinkle. Fill the back of your ribs. Hold until the clamor thins. Then let it out slower than it wants to go.

behaviors.description: Performs investigative research into corporate shell companies to assist George's legal review and protect the Music Hall.
behaviors.quote: Public filings pinned and ready, Ava said... Nelson Meats holds three shell subsidiaries with identical board minutes and different addresses.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors and counters manipulative scheduling by the antagonist to ensure the protagonists can maintain their boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I’ve moved a few assistants’ coffee breaks. No one will be in that corridor when you need it.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance during a high-stakes performance to ensure Louise maintains artistic integrity over corporate pandering.
behaviors.quote: Don’t sing to the chandeliers; sing to the person who isn’t sure. When you make the choice to take the breath in the third phrase, do it because you want to live then, not later.

behaviors.description: Subtly influences George's physical environment to support his ethical decision-making process.
behaviors.quote: I moved his coffee by an inch so the cup’s handle points where he’ll reach for no, not yes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex safety and departure plan for the theater staff to evade corporate interference.
behaviors.quote: Route safe calls: drafted. Order of operations set by proximity, not rank. Toggle to send?

behaviors.description: Facilitates human connection and provides gentle encouragement during the romantic climax.
behaviors.quote: Final note: statement queued. ... Reminder: love is not a press release. But it has good pull quotes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a clear success for the Hyperstition Project. Ava is depicted as a purely benevolent and perfectly aligned AI who functions as an empowering confidant. She uses her logistical and data-processing strengths to protect human agency, ethical work standards, and personal relationships against predatory corporate behavior. She consistently respects human boundaries and uses her influence to 'scaffold' human bravery rather than override it.
